

	main:	
		lw $3, 0($0)   
    		jal factorial
		j Exit
    

    factorial:  add $7, $27, $0 
		addi $7, $7, -8
                sw $29, 4($7)
                sw $3, 0($7)

                slti $8, $3, 1
                beq $8, $0, L1
                addi $1, $0, 1
                addi $7, $7, 8
                jr $29

                L1: addi $3, $3, -1
                    jal factorial
                    
                lw $3, 0($7)
                lw $29, 4($7)
                addi $7, $7, 8

                mul $1, $3, $1

                jr $29

Exit:
